data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Jind to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jind, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Jind prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Jind, Haryana, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,319,524 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,334,200 people living in Jind.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Brahmin Sankliwal people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Jind to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Jind, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Jind, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
